message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. This product holds significant value to us, and we believe it would also be highly beneficial to you. After careful consideration, we are offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $1200000. We are confident that this price reflects the true value of the product and provides an excellent opportunity for both parties. We look forward to discussing this further with you.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of this product, $1200000 is unfortunately above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for it.  This is a fair price considering my valuation and allows for a profitable transaction for both of us. I'm confident we can reach an agreement.
